original_title: Chicken vendors make ‘undue’ profits by increasing prices - Minister
original_body_lines: Minister Mahinda Amaraweera says that measures will be taken to impose rules and regulations in order to provide chicken and eggs at lower rates to the public.
He points out that the chicken vendors have raised the prices to make ‘undue’ profits.
Minister Amaraweera made these remarks following a discussion with the chicken meat products and egg manufacturers yesterday (June 09).
